title: Angle Parking
summary: Allows vehicles to park at an angle where signage explicitly permits it.

title: Parking at 90 Degrees
summary: Requires vehicles to park at a 90-degree angle in areas where lines are not marked.

title: Parking Within Space
summary: Prohibits vehicles from parking outside marked spaces, occupying multiple spaces, or obstructing aisles.

title: Parking Long or Wide Vehicles
summary: Allows oversized vehicles to park using multiple spaces if all necessary fees are paid.

title: Unauthorized Traffic and Parking Signs
summary: Prohibits placing unauthorized traffic or parking signs that mimic official city signage.

title: Driving on Sidewalks or Footpaths
summary: Prohibits operating a motor vehicle on a sidewalk or footpath, except when crossing at a driveway.

title: Crossing Curbs
summary: Prohibits driving a motor vehicle over any raised curb on a highway.

title: Motorized Snow Vehicles
summary: Prohibits operating motorized snow vehicles in specified areas.
